## ReadableEthersBeraBorrow class

Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableBeraBorrow](./lib-base.readableberaborrow.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ReadableEthersBeraBorrow implements ReadableBeraBorrow 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableBeraBorrow](./lib-base.readableberaborrow.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableEthersBeraBorrow` class.
